turns.answer:
In order to qualify for Mafia, you must agree to the following:

1. A good person will not cheat on you

2. A bad person is the only one to cheat on you

3. You have committed
turns.label: unknown

turns.answer: My house, my office, my home, all of my stuff was taken by the Mafia. I told you, I didn't say nothing. I was on my way to the bar, I was supposed to be drinking with a friend that
turns.label: unknown
